content:
Fazilka district is one of new and 22 districts in the state of Punjab in India.

title: Top Places to visit in Gurdaspur, Punjab
content: Gurdaspur district is a district in the Majha region of the state of Punjab, India. Gurdaspur is the district headquarters. title: Top Places to visit in Hoshiarpur, Punjab
content: Hoshiarpur District is a district of Punjab state in northern India. Top Places to visit in Kapurthala, Punjab
content: Kapurthala is a city in Punjab state of India. It is the administrative headquarters of Kapurthala District. title: Top Places to visit in Ludhiana, Punjab
content: Ludhiana District is one of the 22 districts in the state of Punjab in northwest India. It is the largest district of Punjab, by both area and population. title: Top Places to visit in Mansa, Punjab
content: Mansa district falls under the Indian state of Punjab. The headquarters is Mansa city. Mansa district was formed on 13 April 1992 from the erst while district of Bathinda. title: Top Places to visit in Moga, Punjab
content: Moga district is one of the twenty two districts in the state of Punjab, India. It became the 17th district of Punjab State on 24 November 1995 cut from Faridkot district. title: Top Places to visit in Sri Muktsar Sahib, Punjab
content: Sri Muktsar Sahib district, colloquially known by the city's former name Mukstar; is one of the twenty two districts in the Indian state of Punjab. title: Top Places to visit in Pathankot, Punjab
content:
Pathankot district, is a district of Indian Punjab, located in the north zone of the state. Pathankot city is the district headquarters. The district was created on 27 July 2011.
